name: Ninjatown
description:
The adorable and honorable Ninjas must use their unique skills and powers to fight evil and secure Ninjatown.

Adorable and honorable Ninjas populate vibrant, peaceful Ninjatown. The mysterious eruption of a nearby volcano is followed by an attack of hordes of sinister enemies lead by Mr. Demon, who is bent on destruction for unknown reasons. The Ninjas must use their unique skills and powers to fight evil and secure Ninjatown one district

at a time.
